name: tag
description: Allows the creation, modification or deletion of custom tags.

options.name: create
options.description: Create a new tag.

options.name: name
options.description: Name for the tag.

options.name: response
options.description: Response that the tag will give when triggered. Use %AUTH, %CHAN, %GULD for replacements

options.name: modify
options.description: The channel to log bot interactions to.

options.name: access
options.description: Add *either* a role or member to give or revoke access.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: role
options.description: @Role of the role to enable/disable access.

options.name: member
options.description: @Mention of the user to enable/disable access.

options.name: response
options.description: Modify the response string to the tag.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: text
options.description: The new response string.

options.name: name
options.description: Rename an already existing command.

options.name: old-name
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: new-name
options.description: The new name for this tag

options.name: channels
options.description: The channels in which this command is allowed to be run.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to enable/disable usage in.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a tag

options.name: tag
options.description: Tag name to delete

options.name: info
options.description: Show an embed with the settings for this command

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to view. Must already exist.

options.name: list
options.description: List all embeds in the guild, as well as their responses.

name: lobbyhub
description: Create a lobby hub channel to allow users to create their own channels when needed.

options.description: Create a new lobby hub channel using an existing voice channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to use as the hub channel

options.description: The parent (category) to spawn channels under

options.description: Remove the lobby system from an existing hub channel. This will not delete the base voice channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The hub channel you want to remove lobbies from

description: Modify a user's lobby in this guild

options.description: The new size of your lobby. Must be between 1 and 99 inclusive.

options.name: locked
options.description: Lock or unlock your lobby

options.name: toggle
options.description: True to lock, False to unlock.

options.description: Un-register a new auto-divider

name: antispam
description: Configure anti-spam options

options.name: warnthreshold
options.description: Amount of messages sent in a row that will cause a warning.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: kickthreshold
options.description: Amount of messages sent in a row that will cause a kick.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: mutethreshold
options.description: Amount of messages sent in a row that will cause a mute.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: banthreshold
options.description: Amount of messages sent in a row that will cause a ban.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxinterval
options.description: Maximum time (milliseconds) inbetween *different* messages that constitutes action.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxduplicatesinterval
options.description: Maximum time (milliseconds) inbetween *identical* messages that constitutes action.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxduplicateswarn
options.description: Amount of identical messages sent in a row that will cause a warning.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxduplicateskick
options.description: Amount of identical messages sent in a row that will cause a kick.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxduplicatesmute
options.description: Amount of identical messages sent in a row that will cause a mute.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: maxduplicatesban
options.description: Amount identical of messages sent in a row that will cause a ban.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value

options.name: warnenabled
options.description: Whether or not warns are enabled as a punishment.

options.name: enabled
options.description: The new value

options.name: kickenabled
options.description: Whether or not kicks are enabled as a punishment.

options.name: enabled
options.description: The new value

options.name: muteenabled
options.description: Whether or not mutes are enabled as a punishment.

options.name: enabled
options.description: The new value

options.name: banenabled
options.description: Whether or not bans are enabled as a punishment.

options.name: enabled
options.description: The new value

options.name: removebotmessages
options.description: Whether or not to remove bot messages after a punishment.

options.name: enabled
options.description: The new value

options.name: removebotmessagesafter
options.description: How long after bot message to clean it up (milliseconds).

options.name: time
options.description: The new value
